createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating the creation date and time of the mailbox.

editable.description: Flag to indicate whether the mailbox is editable.

email.description: Email address associated with the mailbox.

emailHash.description: Hashed version of the email address for security or identification purposes.

emailSignature.description: Signature to be included in outgoing emails from the mailbox.

ewsCustomSearchFolder.description: Custom search folder configuration for Exchange Web Services.

ewsDelegateSync.description: Delegate synchronization settings for Exchange Web Services.

ewsEndpoint.description: Endpoint URL for Exchange Web Services.

ewsImpersonation.description: Impersonation settings for Exchange Web Services.

ewsSslVerifyMode.description: SSL verification mode for Exchange Web Services.

exchangeVersion.description: Version of Exchange server associated with the mailbox.

imapHost.description: IMAP server host for the mailbox.

imapPort.description: Port number for IMAP server connection.

imapSsl.description: Flag indicating whether SSL is used for IMAP connection.

maxEmailsPerDay.description: Maximum number of emails allowed to be sent per day.

maxMailingsPerDay.description: Maximum number of mailings allowed per day.

maxMailingsPerWeek.description: Maximum number of mailings allowed per week.

optOutMessage.description: Message to be included in opt-out emails from the mailbox.

optOutSignature.description: Signature to be included in opt-out emails from the mailbox.

prospectEmailExclusions.description: List of prospect email exclusions for the mailbox.

providerId.description: Identifier for the email service provider.

sendDisabled.description: Flag indicating whether sending emails is disabled for the mailbox.

sendErroredAt.description: Timestamp indicating the date and time of sending error.

sendMaxRetries.description: Maximum number of retries allowed for sending emails.

sendPermanentErrorAt.description: Timestamp indicating the date and time of a permanent sending error.

sendRequiresSync.description: Flag indicating whether email sending requires synchronization.

sendSuccessAt.description: Timestamp indicating the date and time of successful email sending.

smtpHost.description: SMTP server host for the mailbox.

smtpPort.description: Port number for SMTP server connection.

smtpSsl.description: Flag indicating whether SSL is used for SMTP connection.

syncActiveFrequency.description: Frequency of active synchronization for the mailbox.

syncDisabled.description: Flag indicating whether synchronization is disabled for the mailbox.

syncErroredAt.description: Timestamp indicating the date and time of synchronization error.

syncFinishedAt.description: Timestamp indicating the date and time of synchronization completion.

syncPassiveFrequency.description: Frequency of passive synchronization for the mailbox.

syncPermanentErrorAt.description: Timestamp indicating the date and time of a permanent synchronization error.

syncSuccessAt.description: Timestamp indicating the date and time of successful synchronization.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating the last update date and time of the mailbox.

userId.description: Identifier of the user associated with the mailbox.

creator.description: Information about the user who created the mailbox.

mailAliases.description: List of email aliases associated with the mailbox.

mailings.description: List of mailings associated with the mailbox.

updater.description: Information about the user who last updated the mailbox.

user.description: Information about the user associated with the mailbox.
